title: Game stuck.
body: I was in a rank game with a friend, and all of a sudden i get 500 ping and disconnected, and its been over an hour and 30 mins and apparently game is still going ?? but i cannot reconnect... is this a bug. Both of us are having the same issue, and i asked someone from my friend list and they are having the same issue as well.

replies.body: Oh no, I'm really sorry to hear that.  It sounds like your connection is having problems trying to get back to the game server, and the sudden ping spike does suggest some instability.  It must be frustrating trying to get back in game not really sure what's going on, but I'd like to help!  I suggest sticking to custom games for now to prevent any penalties, and go over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
